topic.title: HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade (Beta): Reference Deployment Scenarios Overview

body.p: You can use the deployment scenarios to familiarize yourself with HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and evaluate its performance.
Note: This feature applies only to servers in the VNF Region.

Both scenarios use AVP network drivers for the test path. For each VM, an additional connection is established, using Linux virtio drivers, to a management network used for provisioning. With each scenario in place, you can attach testing equipment to the private tenant networks in order to evaluate throughput, latency, and other statistics of interest. Traffic generators can be used to send packets along the test path to exercise the different virtual applications and networks. For more information, see Running Traffic Through the Test Paths on page 60.

The scenarios demonstrate several aspects of HP Helion OpenStack Carier Grade, including
a multi-tenant environment
vlan-tagged tenant networks
use of huge pages for high-performance networking
use of unmodified virtio network drivers
use of accelerated AVP Kernel network drivers
use of accelerated AVP Poll Mode network drivers for DPDK
use of virtual routers to connect tenant networks
metadata server access for distributing configuration data
